tests.title: Login With Valid Credentials
tests.fullTitle: Login Test Suite Login With Valid Credentials
tests.code:
cy.url().should('include', 'inventory.html');
inventoryP.getPageTitle().should('have.text', 'Products');

tests.title: Should not allow invalid user to login
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow invalid user to login
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin(_user.default.lockedUser.username, _user.default.lockedUser.password);
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Sorry, this user has been locked out.');

tests.title: Should not allow login with invalid password
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with invalid password
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin(_user.default.validUser.username, 'wrong_password');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with blank username
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with blank username
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('', _user.default.validUser.password);
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username is required');

tests.title: Should not allow login with blank password
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with blank password
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin(_user.default.validUser.username, '');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Password is required');

tests.title: Should not allow login with blank username and password
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with blank username and password
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('', '');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username is required');

tests.title: Should not allow login with special characters
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with special characters
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('!@#$%', '^&*()');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with SQL Injection
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with SQL Injection

tests.title: Should not allow login with very long strings
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with very long strings

tests.title: Should not allow login with whitespace only
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with whitespace only
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('     ', '     ');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with case sensitive username
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with case sensitive username
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('STANDARD_USER', 'secret_sauce');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with case sensitive password
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with case sensitive password
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('standard_user', 'SECRET_SAUCE');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with leading/trailing spaces
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with leading/trailing spaces
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin(' standard_user ', ' secret_sauce ');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with HTML/JS code
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with HTML/JS code
tests.code: loginP.SouceLogin('', 'bold'); loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with Unicode characters
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with Unicode characters
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('Áî®Êà∑', 'ÂØÜÁ†Å');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with emojis
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with emojis
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('üòÄüòÉüòÑ', 'üòÅüòÜüòÖ');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with SQL keywords
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with SQL keywords
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('SELECT * FROM users', 'DROP TABLE users');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with script tags
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with script tags
tests.code: loginP.SouceLogin('', ''); loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with SQL comments
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with SQL comments
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('standard_user--', 'secret_sauce--');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with mixed valid/invalid credentials
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with mixed valid/invalid credentials
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin('standard_user', 'wrong_password');
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');

tests.title: Should not allow login with empty strings
tests.fullTitle: Invalid LOGIN Tests Should not allow login with empty strings
tests.code:
loginP.SouceLogin(String.fromCharCode(0), String.fromCharCode(0));
loginP.errorMessage().should('have.text', 'Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service');
